original_text: They gave gifts to all those who were in the lists of men who could serve God in the temple. They had to be three years old or older. Those men would go into the temple on the right days for their group. They would do the work that their group had to do on those days.
korean_text: 삼 세 이상으로 족보에 기록된 남자 외에 날마다 여호와의 전에 들어가서 그 반열대로 직무에 수종드는 자들에게 다 나눠 주며

sentences.original_text: They gave gifts to all those
who were in the lists of men
who could serve God in the temple
They had to be three years old or older
Those men would go into the temple
on the right days for their group
that their group had to do on those days
sentences.korean_translation: 그 그룹이 그 날들에 해야 했던 일을
